channel.title: Paradox 2.0
channel.description:
I am klorox on r-s. Thread from r-s.
I really can't be fucked to work on this anymore. I'm either gonna take a break or use a completely different source. It's been fun though, this version I would say is significantly better then the previous ones. Although it, just like the other ones, lacks content. I honestly wouldn't call this 2.0, more like 1.2. But eh it doesn't really matter. [b][u]Base[/u]: [i]Riotscape - Emulous 1.7[/i][/b] [b][color=green]Server(Updated December 10th.) -[/COLOR][/b] [url=http://filebeam.com/8e829719a4b0573024d8a883c89f90fe]Download[/url] [b]Server Mirror [/b][url=http://www.mediafire.com/?zxzzncmjyzq]Download(Mediafire)[/url] [b][color=green]Client - [/COLOR][/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?ulmnq4ygn5f]http://www.mediafire.com/?ulmnq4ygn5f[/url] [code]- Npc Agression - Tweaked Formulas - Added proper ranged attack Styles - Long range hit's farther (100% perfect) - Rapid hit's faster (100% perfect) - Accurate hits faster (80% perfect - increased a bit) - Multi- Ice barrage added. - Attacking another players npc in a non-multi zone prevention Added - Dragon claw spec(99% perfect) - Magic runs on a seperate timer. Better then last time. - God sword specs with 100% perfect effects - Npc attack style bugs sorted. - Perfect Magic short bow special - It lacked the 2nd pull back previously. - Barrows bugs fixed. - Barrows rewards added. - Chivalry / Piety added. - Equipment Screen added - Rules screen looks alot nicer. - Cleaned up some things. - Tons of small bugs fixed. - Fuck tons more I can't really remember.[/code] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2rxxqfn.png[/img] Latest Fixes [code] - Lots of PvP Oreintated fixes - Rushing on players works. - Several magic bugs sorted - You will no longer cast ice barrage on your self in multi-zones. - Previously when you casted magic from a distance greater then 10 squares, it would attack with your weapon. That's fixed. - Melee defense should be a bit better.[/code] Credits: Animatrix, SWAT, Hayzie, Graham, Martin, Lmcstruck, and a few others. If I didn't mention you just let me know. Ps: I don't care if you don't like the purple lava texture so don't bitch about it.

item.title: Paradox 2.0
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“Liquicity, post:38, topic:318250”][quote author=cocoa link=topic=414741.msg3055999#msg3055999 date=1260479872]
At every single person flaming i pk girls. She may not be talking about the right thing but she definitely does have it right. There are tutorials for every single thing here.

(no offence to Liquicity)
[/quote]
Actually there isn’t. The only tutorial’s I’ve used are for client side things. Take a look at the original source and all the problems it has and you’ll see what I mean. It’s better then 99% of the trash on this forum. I hate to flame everyone here but shit everyone is so stupid.[/quote]
That’s what I was trying to say. The client side things are all tutorials. I didn’t bother to look at server features.

P.S: Just checked server features. Seems to be only combat features were fixed/added. That really disappoints me.

Read full topic
